name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.value:
I beg you, please stop referring to “competency at interacting with other human beings” as “soft skills.”

Stop it. Just stop. Please.

Stop giving cutesy names to things, undermining both their importance and the effort that goes into them.

Please stop.
content.html: I beg you, please stop referring to “competency at interacting with other human beings” as “soft skills.” Stop it. Just stop. Please. Stop giving cutesy names to things, undermining both their importance and the effort that goes into them. Please stop.
